gui.touhou_little_maid.portable_audio.pl:
The mod detects that the NetEase Cloud Music playlist is empty. The reasons may be as follows:

- NetEase Cloud Music is not open for use in your region
- Your current network environment cannot connect to NetEase Cloud Music server
- Netease Cloud Music blocks the IP you use
- Other unknown network issues

Currently, only NetEase Cloud Music is supported, so only players from China Mainland can use it, we apologize for this.
However, we will add more support from other music websites in the future, so stay tuned.

Please note: This is a network problem between you and NetEase Cloud Music, not a mod bug!

[Press Esc to exit this interface]

§a§lS Level Weight: %d
§c§lSR Level Weight: %d
§5§lSSR Level Weight: %d
§6§lUR Level Weight: %d

§9§n[click the Edit button again to return]

patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.landin: A mod about the maid and the touhou project.$(br2)Thanks to Snownee for help in coding. $(br)Thanks to Succinum, Pajinyi, ZeniCrow, Tian_mi, Paulzzh, Yuriscat and other artists for producing excellent models and textures.$(br)Thanks to Verclene, the author of little maid mob mod.
memorizable_gensokyo.categories.maid.des: Introduced the basic functions of the maid
memorizable_gensokyo.categories.overview: Introduce the new overview content of this mod.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.maid.backpa: The backpack can be used to expand the inventory of the maid. It can be applied by holding the backpack and right-click on the maid. The backpack has three levels. $(br2)Use the camera to remove the maid's backpack, and backpack can be remove by shift left-click.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.maid.compas: The compass is used in conjunction with the maid's home mode. Right-clicking on a block records the coordinates, then right-clicking the maid can set coordinates for it.

Compass has 4 modes:$(br)$(li)Single point: The maid will move within 16 block within the set coordinates.$(li)Multi-point reentry: The maid will move back and forth along the set coordinates.$(li)Multi-point closure: The maid will move cyclically along the set coordinates.$(li)Set range: The maid will only move within the setting range.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.maid.draw_c: When the free switching maid model function was turned off in the configuration file, we designed a new skin switching method for it.$(br2)Similar to a card drawing game, players consume emerald or gashapon coin to draw gashapon and obtain maid model coupon from it.
Right-click with emerald or gashapon coin to get a gashapon, gashapon's level and probability can be customized.

Right-click gashapon to get model coupon. gashapon of different levels can get model coupon of different levels. $(br2)The probability can be customized through the csv file, for details, please see the mod's wiki
Right-click on a maid to switch its model.
Kill the rinnosuke will get a certain amount of gashapon coins. Secondly, you can obtain gashapon coins through model coupon craft.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.maid.gap.pa: A bauble that can transport items. $(br2)You can right-click chest with the gap to mark it, then open its GUI to make some settings, and finally place it in the maid's bauble inventory. $(br2)After this, the maid will take out/deposit the specified items "wirelessly" from the chest.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.maid.hata_s: This maid will hurt the player, and other maids or pets. That is why hata sasimono was designed.

Craft a hata sasimono, and then right-click on a maid to add hata sasimono to the maid. You can find the corresponding button to switch the style of hata sasimono in the main GUI.$(br2)You can also customize your own hata sasimono. Check the wiki for more instructions.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.maid.item_m: A bauble that can expand the pickup range. $(br2)After being equipped, the maid's pickup range of items, arrows, experience orb, and power points will be greatly increased.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.maid.maid_b: There are many basic functions that maids are able to perform, such as:$(li)By default, the maid will actively pick up items, arrows and experience orbs around her. The main GUI has a button to switch pick up mode;$(li)By default, the maid will always follow the player.

$(li)Shift right-clicking maid with an empty hand can switch sitting mode. In sitting mode, the doesn't do anything, including avoiding danger.$(li)When the maid ride on other entities, Shift right-clicking with an empty hand can remove them.$(li)The player can use a golden apple or potion on a maid by right-clicking them while holding the item.

$(li)The experience picked up by the maid can be converted into an Bottle o' Enchanting if the player right-click the maid while holding a bottle.$(li)The maid can equip the skull and render model of it.$(li)Right-click the maid with an empty nameplate, and you can name it directly.

$(li)After install Journey Map Mod, the coordinates displayed by the maid at death can be directly clicked to save as the coordinates of the Journey Map, or you can ctrl click to view it under the big map window of the Journey Map.

The third tab of the maids' GUI is the bauble inventory. This mod provides several baubles that can be triggered to protect maids under certain conditions:$(li)Ultramarine Orb Elixir: Can be used 6 times to avoid a maid's death.$(li)Tombstone Bauble: Tombstones that generate upon a maid's death to preserve their items.

$(li)Protect Bauble: When the maid receives the corresponding damage, the damage event is canceled.$(li)Nimble Fabric: When a maid equipped with this bauble is hit by projectile, her behavior will be exactly the same as the ender.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.maid.maid_c: This mod adds a lot of configuration for maids. You can enable/disable each mode of the maids, set some attributes of the maids, and limit the maximum number of maids that can be tamed by the player.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.maid.maid_s: The maids' skin is completely customizable, you can easily change the maids' skin in game.$(br2)you can also add a third-party resource pack to increase the style of the maid's skin.

Below the maid's gui, you can open the resource pack download gui, where you can download maid model resource packs made by other players.$(br2)Downloaded the resource pack, just load it in the game to use more maid models.

Use the $(l:https://blockbench.net/)Blockbench$(/l) software to easily create your own maid skin resource pack. $(br2)The maid skin model perfectly compatible with the 1.10.0 version of the bedrock edition entity model.$(br2)For more information on custom maid skins, please check out the Wiki.
You can make custom sound packs to replace or expand the maid's sound effects. There are related buttons at the bottom of the maid's inventory. $(br2)Click the button to open the sound playback gui.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.maid.maid_t: When you open a maid's GUI, you can see a list on the left side. This is a maid's task bar. The related functions are as the following:$(li)Idle: default task; the maid does nothing.$(li)Attack: if you put a sword on a maid's main hand, the maid's behavior will be the same as a vanilla wolf, actively attacking hostile creatures.

$(li)Bow: If you put a bow on a maid's main hand, and put arrows in any other inventory blocks, they will actively attack hostile creatures with bows.$(li)Danmaku: If you put the gohei in a maid's main hand, she will shoot danmaku to attack the hostile creatures, and launch different numbers of danmaku according to the number of hostile creatures around her.

$(li)Farm: If you put crop seeds on the maid, she will actively plant crops around her, and actively harvest them. Only when maid has a hoe in mainhand can break crop like the player.$(li)Sugarcane: plants and harvests sugarcanes.$(li)Melons: harvest watermelons and pumpkins.$(li)Cocoa: plant and harvest cocoas.$(li)Grass: clean weeds and flowers around them.

$(li)Snow: clean the snow layer around them, snowball drops when holding a shovel.$(li)Feed: if you put food in a maid's inventory, she will activly feed the player when the player's hunger value is low.$(li)Shears: if you put shears in a maid's main hand, she will actively shear sheep around her.$(li)Torch: if you put torches on a maid, they will actively place torches in the low brightness areas.

$(li)Breed: if you put the items needed to breed animals in a maid's inventory. She will actively feed the surrounding animals.$(li)Extinguishing: the mainhand of the maid needs to hold a fire extinguisher. When this mode is turned on, the maid will extinguish the fire of the owner, itself, and tamable entities within 3 blocks.

$(li)Destroy: need to be used in conjunction with the destroy guide. First use the destroy guide to mark the block to be destroyed, then place it in maid's offhand, and finally place a pickaxe in maid's mainhand. The maid can destroy the marked blocks.$(li)Furnace: It needs to be used in conjunction with the furnace guide.

First open furnace guide's GUI to mark the required fuel and items, and then place it in maid's mainhand. The maid will look for the surrounding furnaces to use.$(li)Brewing: need to be used in conjunction with potion guide. First open the potion guide's GUI to mark the recipe for potion, and then place it in maid's mainhand. The maid will find the brewing stands around to brew.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.maid.mute_b: After equipped with this bauble, the maid will become very quiet.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.maid.naming: A specially named maid can display a special model.$(br2)By default, a maid named with $(#ff0000)=>id$() can become the player skin model corresponding to that id.$(br2)The maid resource pack can also add custom model eggs, even SHA1 encrypted model eggs.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.maid.spawn_: The way to get a maid is very special and needs to be done through a multi-blocks altar.$(br2)Since the recipe is likely to change in the future, please check the JEI altar label.$(br2)After the maid is successfully spawned in a multi-blocks altar, you will get a cake box wrapped with the maid. You can right-click the cake box to open it.

You need to right-click three times to trigger different opening stages, and finally the cake box will disappear.$(br2)You will need a cake to tame the maid. the taming items can be changed in the configuration file, which was mentioned already.$(br2)The tamed maid is almost identical to a vanilla pet, and you can right-click to open her GUI.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.maid.substi: Substitute jizo is a creative mode item that can be set to invincible mode when right-click the maid.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.other.broom: The broom is a convenient flying tool that allows the player to right click on the ride and use the AWSD keys on the keyboard to navigate. $(br2)The maid will also ride on broom when she is near the broom, and the maid who sits on the broom will move in flight status in most cases.
However, currently only creative mode players are allowed to ride the broom. You can modify the configuration file to disable this feature.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.other.camer: Carry a maid across dimensions or at a distance is a hassle, and the camera is designed for this purpose. $(br2)Just take a photo of your maid with camera and turn it into a photo, then hold the photo and right click on a block to release it.
If you have a album on the inventory, use the camera, the photos will be directly into the album, and then you can place the maids one by one by use album right click on a block.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.other.chair: The custom cushion is a purely decorative item, placed directly on the ground by right-click, and shift left-click can destroy it, right-click to sit, shift right-click to open the GUI to switch the cushion style.

Some of the cushions can sit directly when the maid is close, shift right-click to the maid can leave the cushion.$(br2)The cushion model can also be completely customized, or you can quickly add a custom model through the resource package. For related customizations, please check the wiki.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.other.chise: Right-click the clay with a chisel can make statues of different sizes. Currently supports 1x1x1, 1x1x2, 2x2x4, 3x3x6 sizes.
The player holds a photo of the maid in offhand, the mainhand holds the chisel, then right-clicks the lower left corner of the multi-block structure to engrave the maid in the photo.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.other.comma: $(#f00)/hata reload$() Reload all hata textures$(br)$(#f00)/maid_res reload$() Reload the maid resource pack. This command does not completely reload some resources. It is recommended to use the F3+T shortcut key.$(br)$(#f00)/draw_coupon reload$() Reload draw coupon.$(br)$(#f00)/spell_card reload$() Reload all spell card data.
$(#f00)/touhou_little_maid power$() Set player power value$(br)$(#f00)/touhou_little_maid maid_num$() Set player's maid num
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.other.draw_: The server-side resource pack distribution system allows every player who enters the server to forcibly install an additional maid model of the server. $(br2)With the visual drawing configuration gui, we can quickly and easily restrict the acquisition of maid skin models.

After your client model is fully matched with the server, and the server has turned on the option "Cannot change maid skin", you can open the draw configuration gui through the /draw gui command, and the configuration gui will actively get all the maids from the server model data.$(br2)Then you can quickly modify the pool and weight in it. Click the button to save, or save and reload.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.other.extin: The items used with the maid extinguishing mode and cannot be used by players.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.other.favor: Right-click on the maid to tweak maid's favorability, cannot craft.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.other.garag: The garage kit is the drop item upon a maid's death, storing all the NBT data for the dead maid. Re-crafting in the altar can revive the maid.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.other.maid_: The shrine lamp is a good decoration and has certain practical functions. Right click on the upper part of the shrine lamp to open the GUI, store the player's power point.

It also can select effect, then will consume power points to bring the effect to the surrounding range of maids.$(br2)The shrine lamp is also a good tool for automatically collecting power point. It can automatically collect power point within 3 blocks and store them.
The player can sleep, and naturally the maid can also sleep. At night or on a thunderstorm, the maid has the probability to look for the surrounding bed to sleep.

The sleeping maid will no longer be attacked by hostile creatures, and the maid’s GUI cannot be opened at this time.$(br2)But remember, don't wake them up when the maids are asleep, or they will have a great decline in your favorability.
These are multi-block structures, so please put them in a place with enough space.
The maid will randomly play in these block, and the maid's favorability will slowly increase during the play.

Of course, if they encounter dangerous situations such as hostile creatures, the maids will still take the initiative to run away. $(br2)After all, life is always more important than entertainment itself.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.other.npc_m: Npc maid tool is a tool compatible with the custom npc mod. $(br2)When the npc's model is set as touhou little maid, you can use this tool right-click the npc to set a custom maid model.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.other.porta: The portable audio can be picked up by the maid, right-click it can open the GUI, play network music, and synchronize to players within 96 squares.$(br2)Currently only NetEase Cloud Music is supported, but we will add support for more music websites later.

Audio playlists can be added through the resource pack, but you need to restart the game to load these playlists.$(br2)The audio can be disabled by modifying the configuration, or you can mute it by adjusting the volume of the record.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.other.power: Right-click is thrown out, can drop the power point entity.$(br2)You can find the power point of the item form in the dungeon loot chest.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.other.scare: The scarecrow can dispel the fairy maid, the rinnosuke and the creeper within 10 blocks.$(br2)The scarecrow can enter the player id and replace it with the head skin of the player, and can also write text on the sign on the chest.
Scarecrow has a lightning strike eggs.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.other.serve: The maid can easily add additional resources through the resource pack, just as simple as replacing texture and shadow.$(br2)But there is a problem on the server. Your friend must install the same resource pack as you, so that he can see the same maid model as you.

The server owner also needs to distribute resource packs to each player in advance, and tell them to install it before entering the server, so that they can see the additional maid models. $(br2)This is a very difficult and inconvenient thing.

Now you only need to put the maid resource pack in the touhou-little-maid-server-pack folder in the server directory, and enter the /tlm_server_pack reload command. $(br2)Then every player who enters the server will actively download the resources in this folder Package and install silently.

We also fully considered the problems of server network congestion and player modification models. $(br2)After the player enters the server, the resource pack is downloaded intermittently, and will not cause a lot of traffic in an instant.

The resource pack downloaded by the server will also be cached to avoid wasting valuable bandwidth. A CRC32 cyclic redundancy value check is performed every time a downloaded resource pack is checked. $(br2)This check method avoids the possibility of some players modifying the resource pack.

And the resource pack installed silently on the server side will not affect other operations. You can still install additional resource packs on your client. $(br2)When you log out of the server and enter the single play, or other servers, these silently installed resource packs will also be uninstalled automatically.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.other.smart: This is not an ordinary paper, it is attached to the soul of the ancient maid.$(br2)Each player will get a soul spell when they are spawn, right click to release a maid.

The spell can be reused, you can right-click on the maid to put it back into the spell. In the dungeon loot chest, soul spell can also be found very rarely.$(br2)You can disable the above two spell acquisition methods through configuration, and the spell will also be restricted by the "maximum number of player maids" configuration.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.other.suitc: The suitcase is an entity that can store items. The maid can carry it when approaching the suitcase. Shift right-click the maid to remove the suitcase.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.other.troll: The trolley audio is similar to the suitcase, and its use is exactly the same as the vanilla jukebox.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.other.trump: A tool to recall the maid, right-click to use. $(br2)$(4)$(l)Note: This item can only recall the maid on the loaded chunk. From a technical point of view, there is currently NO ANY WAY to recall the maid on the unload chunk.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.other.vanil: Modifications to two vanilla entity models have been added to the configuration of this mod. $(br2)One can modify the vanilla slime model to yukkuri, and the other can modify the vanilla experience orb model to score point.$(br2)You can also change the vanilla totem of undying to the texture of the life point.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.other.vehic: The vehicle is a series of entities that the maid can drive. The maid will drive it when approaching a $(l)empty$() vehicle, and then the surrounding maids can ride the vehicle.$(br2)Players can also ride this vehicle by right click.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.overview.fa: Favorability system is a way for a maid to improve her attributes. If you can take good care of your maid, her favorability will increase rapidly. $(br2)And at the same time, the maid's healthy, healthy recovery speed and attack value will also be greatly improved.

The following operations can increase the maid's favorability:$(li)The maid wakes up naturally after falling asleep$(li)The maid plays on the book desk, electronic piano, and live station$(br2)The following operations will reduce the maid's favorability:$(li)Forcibly wake the sleeping maid$(li)Maid death

$(li)The player accidentally injured the maid (the hata sasimono can reduce the value)$(li)The maid is still working during thunderstorms or night$(br2)There are currently five levels of favorability. Low favorability currently does not have any negative effects, but high favorability can improve the attributes of a maid.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.overview.go: The gohei is a ranged weapon that can be used to shoot danmaku, and it also can be used as a normal melee weapon.$(br2)When you hold the gohei and press alt to scroll the mouse wheel, you can switch the danmaku style of the shoot.
The higher power point player has, the higher damage and speed the danmaku has.$(br2)The gohei is an important tool for building a multi-block altar.
The player holds gohei to shoot danmaku
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.overview.mu: The altar is the multi-block structure required for the craft of this mod.$(br2)The altar's recipes can be obtained through JEI, and the craft also requires player's $(l:overview/power_point)power point$().
Use the $(l:overview/gohei_and_danmaku)gohei$() to right click on the red wool in the center left of the fourth layer to build the altar.

You can place the item by right-clicking on the top of the six oak pillars of the altar. You can remove the item by empty-handed right-clicking.$(br2)When the item is completely placed and the player's power point is enough, altar can trigger craft.$(br2)The craft is interrupted due to lack of power, and after obtaining enough power, right click again to re-trigger the craft.
The craft of spawn lightning, remember all craft is shapeless.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.overview.po: The power point is an important resource for this mod, which is obtained by killing the $(l:overview/world_spawn#fairy)maid fairy$() or $(l:overview/world_spawn#rinnosuke)rinnosuke morichika$().$(br2)Can be used for $(l:overview/multiblocks_altar)altar$() crafting.

When you holds the $(l:overview/gohei_and_danmaku)gohei$(), you can see your power point number in the upper left corner of the game screen. $(br2)The maximum power point is 5, and more than this number power point no longer increases.
Power point entity dropped on the ground.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.overview.wh: The Touhou Project is a Japanese doujin game series by Sole Team Shanghai Alice member ZUN that specializes in Shoot 'em Ups.
The main protagonist of the Touhou Project series.
memorizable_gensokyo.entries.overview.wo: This mod adds two mobs. $(br2)The looting of mob are important crafting ingredient.$(br2)The chance of spawn hostile creatures in this mod can be modified in the configuration file. When set to 0, these monsters can be prohibited from spawn.
Spawn in the plain biome at night, it will fly and simultaneously shoot danmaku to attack players and maids.
Spawn in the forest biome at night, it will attack players and maids.
